tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE smart_locks_status (
  lock_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  lock_name VARCHAR(255),
  entry_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  exit_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  user_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE smart_locks (
    lock_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    lock_name VARCHAR(50),
    lock_location VARCHAR(50),
    lock_status VARCHAR(50),
    entry_time TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE lock_access_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    lock_id INT,
    access_time TIMESTAMP,
    user_id INT,
    access_type VARCHAR(50),
    FOREIGN KEY (lock_id) REFERENCES smart_locks(lock_id)
);

CREATE TABLE lock_access (
    access_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    lock_id UUID REFERENCES smart_locks(lock_id),
    user_id UUID,
    access_type VARCHAR(10),
    access_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE lock_events (
    event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    lock_id INT,
    event_type VARCHAR(50),
    event_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (lock_id) REFERENCES smart_locks(lock_id)
);

CREATE TABLE access_log (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    lock_id INT,
    access_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    is_successful BOOLEAN,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (lock_id) REFERENCES smart_locks(lock_id)
);

CREATE TABLE alerts (
    alert_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    lock_id INT,
    alert_type VARCHAR(50),
    alert_description TEXT,
    alert_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (lock_id) REFERENCES smart_locks(lock_id)
);
